item.title: 巴宝莉将在缺席一年后重新加入英国蓝筹股基准市场
item.description: 巴宝莉集团（Burberry Group Plc）在失去英国蓝筹股标杆地位一年后，又重返英国股市精英行列。【原文：A year after losing its spot in Britain’s blue-chip benchmark, Burberry Group Plc is returning to the UK’s stock-market elite.】

item.title: 亚马逊因天价送货车维修费面临反弹
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）希望更新其老化的蓝色送货车队，但使用这些货车运送包裹的小企业表示，他们正被 2 万美元或更多的维修账单吓得不知所措，根本无力承担。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. wants to refresh its aging fleet of blue delivery vans, but the small businesses that use them to ferry packages say they’re getting blindsided by repair bills of $20,000 or more that they can ill afford.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长维勒鲁瓦抨击特朗普美联储攻击的 "严重倒退
item.description: 法国央行行长弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）加入了全球政策制定者的行列，就白宫对美联储的攻击发出警报。【原文：Bank of France Governor Francois Villeroy de Galhau joined a chorus of global policymakers sounding the alarm over White House attacks on the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 特朗普公司 54 亿美元数字硬币受市场动荡冲击
item.description: 特朗普公司大肆宣扬的加密货币进军— WLFI代币— 周一推出，雄心勃勃地要成为新数字生态系统的支柱。几个小时内，它就陷入了长期以来一直是加密货币交易标志的动荡和不稳定之中。【原文：Trump Inc.’s much-trumpeted crypto foray — the WLFI token — launched Monday with ambitions of serving as the backbone of a new digital ecosystem. Within hours, it was mired in the turbulence and instability that has long been the hallmarks of crypto trading.】

item.title: 卡尼在与特朗普进行 "极具建设性 "的通话后派遣特使前往华盛顿
item.description: 马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）表示，在周一晚间与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）进行了 "非常有建设性 "的对话之后，加拿大和美国正在进行谈判，以解决受关税影响行业的问题。【原文：Mark Carney said Canada and the US are in negotiations to resolve issues in tariff-hit sectors after a “very constructive” conversation with President Donald Trump on Monday evening.】

item.title: 指证 Hwang 的前 Archegos 风险主管免于牢狱之灾
item.description: Archegos Capital Management 公司前首席风险官在华尔街沸沸扬扬的欺诈和市场操纵案庭审中指证创始人 Bill Hwang，从而避免了因其在公司崩溃中所扮演的角色而入狱。【原文：Archegos Capital Management’s former chief risk officer avoided prison for his role in the firm’s meltdown after testifying against founder Bill Hwang at a fraud and market manipulation trial that riveted Wall Street.】

item.title: 高盛和 KKR 是斯塔达 14 亿欧元 PIK 债务的贷款人之一
item.description: 高盛资产管理公司（Goldman Sachs Asset Management）和 KKR & Co.是提供约 14 亿欧元最昂贵债务的贷款方之一，以支持 CapVest Partners 收购德国制药商 Stada Arzneimittel AG 的多数股权。【原文：Goldman Sachs Asset Management and KKR & Co. are among lenders providing around €1.4 billion of one of the most expensive types of debt to back CapVest Partners’ acquisition of a majority stake in German drugmaker Stada Arzneimittel AG.】

item.title: ETF 数量现已超过股票。这意味着什么？
item.description:
在本期万亿节目中，我们将讨论交易所交易基金的爆炸式增长，以及它如何改变投资方式。【原文：

In this episode of Trillions, we discuss the explosive growth of exchange-traded funds and how that’s transforming investing.

】

item.title: Instagram 首次发布 iPad 应用程序，聚焦卷轴游戏
item.description: Instagram 首次推出专门的 iPad 应用程序，为其广受欢迎的移动应用程序提供重新设计的版本，旨在鼓励更多的视频消费。【原文：Instagram is launching a dedicated iPad app for the first time, offering a redesigned version of its popular mobile app that’s meant to encourage more video consumption.】

item.title: 英美资源集团将通过出售股权退出铂金分拆公司 Valterra
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）在完成对其铂金开采部门的分拆后仅数月，就开始出售其在 Valterra Platinum Ltd. 剩余的约 20% 股份。【原文：Anglo American Plc is offering its remaining stake of about 20% in Valterra Platinum Ltd. just months after completing the demerger of its platinum mining arm.】

item.title: 阳狮集团首席执行官看好下半年业绩，公司业绩随之上升
item.description: 阳狮集团（Publicis Groupe SA）首席执行官阿瑟-萨东（Arthur Sadoun）表示对下半年充满信心，公司股价升至五周以来的最高点，此前该公司曾警告广告业务可能放缓。【原文：Publicis Groupe SA shares rose to the highest in five weeks after Chief Executive Officer Arthur Sadoun expressed confidence in the second half of the year, after the company had previously warned of a potential advertising slowdown.】

item.title: 莫桑比克为 1.3 亿美元的国有航空公司救助计划设立 SPV
item.description: 莫桑比克内阁在一份声明中说，莫桑比克正在为一个国有企业集团创建一个特殊目的机构，以收购国家航空公司 LAM 的股份。【原文：Mozambique is creating a special-purpose vehicle for a group of state-owned companies to acquire shares in the national airline LAM, the cabinet said in a statement.】

item.title: M&G 股价在《金融时报》报道阿波罗研究交易后短暂飙升
item.description: 据《金融时报》报道，阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.该股很快抹去了涨幅。【原文：M&G Plc shares spiked as much as 8.6% on Wednesday after the Financial Times reported that Apollo Global Management Inc. considered a takeover bid for the London-listed money manager and life insurer. The shares quickly erased gains.】

item.title: 美国大豆种植条件减弱，降雨帮助大豆生长
item.description: 大豆期货周三触及近两周来的最低水平，因为降雨正在帮助美国干涸的田地。【原文：Soybean futures touched the lowest level in nearly two weeks Wednesday as rainfall was aiding parched US fields.】

item.title: 印度批准从废物中回收关键矿物的计划
item.description: 印度内阁批准了一项价值 150 亿卢比（1.7 亿美元）的激励计划，以促进电池和电子垃圾中关键矿物的回收利用，并加大力度确保稀土的获取。【原文：India’s cabinet approved a 15 billion rupee ($170 million) incentive program to boost recycling of critical minerals from batteries and e-waste, stepping up efforts to secure access to rare earths.】

item.title: 康菲石油公司称将裁员 20%-25%：路透社
item.description: 据路透社报道，石油和天然气生产商康菲石油公司（ConocoPhillips）表示将裁员 20% 至 25%。【原文：Oil and natural gas producer ConocoPhillips says it will cut 20% to 25% of its workforce, according to Reuters.】

item.title: Blackstone 私人信贷基金开拓美国高等级债券市场
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 旗舰私人信贷基金将于周三出售五年期投资级债券，这是最新一家商业发展公司推出或表示计划发售美元债券。【原文：Blackstone Inc.’s flagship private credit fund is selling five-year, investment-grade debt Wednesday, the latest business development company to market or signal plans to offer dollar bonds.】

item.title: 美联储将于下月举办 "支付创新 "大会
item.description: 美联储将于 10 月 21 日召开会议，讨论如何改进支付系统，以迎接与加密货币和人工智能相关的新参与者。【原文：The Federal Reserve will host an Oct. 21 conference to discuss how to improve payments system in a bid to welcome new entrants tied to crypto and artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚中央银行行长在完成改革后辞职
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚国家银行行长马莫-米赫雷图（Mamo Mihretu）在任职两年半后辞职。【原文：National Bank of Ethiopia Governor Mamo Mihretu has resigned after serving in the role for 2 1/2 years during which he helped implement extensive reforms to overhaul the nation’s economy.】

item.title: 美国比特币股价飙升，特朗普再次向加密货币套现
item.description: 美国比特币公司（American Bitcoin Corp）是美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的两个长子今年共同创建的一家加密货币公司，在一系列迂回交易将其推向公开市场后，该公司在周三的首次交易中大涨。这笔交易为埃里克-特朗普（Eric Trump）和小唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump Jr.）铺平了道路，他们两人都持有这家比特币矿商的股份，在他们父亲的管理下，他们从加密货币的主流拥抱中再次获利。【原文：American Bitcoin Corp., a crypto company created this year with President Donald Trump’s two eldest sons, surged in initial trading on Wednesday, after a roundabout series of transactions lifted it on to public markets. The deal paved the way for Eric Trump and Donald Trump Jr., both of whom hold stakes in the Bitcoin miner, to profit anew from crypto’s mainstream embrace under their father’s administration.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司加入债务出售大潮，一年来首次达成交易
item.description: 巴西国家控制的石油生产商巴西石油公司（Petroleo Brasileiro SA）将于周三进入全球债券市场，加入本周出售债务的公司和政府行列。【原文：Brazil’s state-controlled oil producer Petroleo Brasileiro SA is tapping global bond markets on Wednesday, joining a flurry of companies and governments selling debt this week.】

item.title: 英格兰银行行长警告不要关注长期吉尔债券
item.description: 英国央行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）淡化了长期金边债券收益率飙升的重要性，这种飙升加剧了人们对英国脆弱的财政状况面临不稳定风险的担忧。【原文：Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey played down the importance of a surge in long-dated gilt yields that has stoked concerns that Britain’s fragile fiscal position risks being destabilized.】

item.title: 英国央行伦巴第利称 4% 的利率接近中性水平
item.description: 英国央行副行长克莱尔-隆巴代利（Clare Lombardelli）表示，利率可能只需略低于目前的 4% 水平，就能控制通胀，这是她自 8 月份降息四分之一个百分点以来首次发表公开评论。【原文：Bank of England Deputy Governor Clare Lombardelli said interest rates may need to settle only slightly below their current level of 4% to keep inflation under control, in her first public comments since August’s quarter-point cut.】

item.title: 欧佩克+面临石油市场份额争夺战的下一阶段
item.description: 在以一系列增产措施震惊石油世界之后，欧佩克+正准备在周日的一次关键会议上决定下一步行动。【原文：After stunning the oil world with a slew of production increases, OPEC+ is preparing to decide its next move at a key meeting on Sunday.】

item.title: 西捷航空巨额订购波音飞机，称加拿大和美国从中受益
item.description: 加拿大第二大航空公司西捷航空（WestJet）将购买 67 架波音飞机，并可选择购买更多飞机，这是该公司有史以来最大的一笔订单，目的是在与美国的贸易紧张局势持续存在的情况下推动未来增长。【原文：WestJet, Canada’s second-largest airline, will purchase 67 Boeing Co. aircraft with an option for more, placing its biggest-ever order in a push for future growth even as trade tensions with the US persist.】

item.title: 萨默斯称特朗普将美联储置于 "信誉危机 "的边缘
item.description: 前财政部长劳伦斯-萨默斯（Lawrence Summers）警告说，虽然金融市场迄今为止对美联储的独立性表现出的担忧有限，但形势 "可能会很快发生转变"。【原文：Former Treasury Secretary Lawrence Summers warned that while financial markets have so far shown limited concern with regard to the Federal Reserve’s independence, the situation “could turn very quickly.”】

item.title: 美国 7 月职位空缺降至近一年来最低水平
item.description: 美国 7 月份的职位空缺降至 10 个月来的最低点，其他数据也显示，在政策不确定性加剧的情况下，美国对工人的需求逐渐减少。【原文：US job openings fell in July to the lowest in 10 months, adding to other data that show a gradually diminishing appetite for workers amid heightened policy uncertainty.】

item.title: 英国央行行长贝利称特朗普对美联储的攻击 "非常令人担忧
item.description: 安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）警告说，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对美联储的批评是 "一条危险的道路"，这是英格兰银行行长迄今为止为世界最大经济体的央行独立性所做的最尖锐的辩护。【原文：Andrew Bailey warned that US President Donald Trump’s criticism of the Federal Reserve was “dangerous road to go down,” in the Bank of England governor’s most pointed defense yet of central bank independence in the world’s largest economy.】

item.title: 美联储博斯蒂克称 2025 年仍宜降息一次
item.description: 亚特兰大联邦储备银行行长拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）重申，他认为今年降息一次是合适的，不过这可能会根据通胀和劳动力市场的情况发生变化。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta President Raphael Bostic reiterated he sees one interest-rate cut as appropriate for this year, though that could change based on what happens with inflation and the labor market.】

item.title: 进口激增打破加纳塞地的世界纪录
item.description: 公司在年底假期前支付进口商品的美元需求激增，结束了加纳塞地的世界性表现。【原文：A surge in demand for dollars by companies paying for imports before the year-end holiday season has ended the Ghanaian cedi’s world-beating performance.】
